About

I am a cognitive science student at the University of Tuebingen. This website was created for my bachelor thesis that is about AI planning using the Planning Domain Definition Language PDDL. Searching for an efficient way of writing PDDL domains and problems, I decided to create a PDDL package for the awesome Sublime Text Editor.

If you have any questions, issues or ideas, please feel free to contact me. My email address is:
volker.strobel87@gmail.com

Related work:

  • PDDL Studio by Miroslav Chomut and Tomas Plch - an IDE for developing PDDL documents
  • PDDL Mode by Surendra K Singhi - an extension for GNU Emacs that supports PDDL 2.2

Important - PDDL Online Editor

Please read before opening the editor

The green link below will open the PDDL Online Editor so that you can see an example of the PDDL Syntax Highlighting. It was created with the Ace code editor. Simply paste in your code or write a new domain or problem from scratch. Although it is a fully functional code editor, the Package for Sublime Text has many additional features.

Important: The editor could take some time to load. However, if it is still not loaded after a longer period of time, please refresh the editor page and make sure that JavaScript is enabled in your browser.
